txGroup.tx: Kineu Abet Kalokis, apaakor 1968 namba 10 October. Neu natrauswen nen kafo preg ur ni kotfan ne

idGroup.fg: I am Abet Kalokis, I was born in 1968, on the 10th of October. My story this afternoon, I'll talk about young people's life today.

txGroup.tx: pes nam̃olien ni tefsofus ni mees. Taos nalelewen neu pak tefsofus ni mees.

idGroup.fg: talk about young people's lives today. As my opinion on young people today.

txGroup.tx: Mees gar rutik ki naftekin, rutik ki naftekin nfaketanwen go rutik ki naftekin nanrogwen.

idGroup.fg: Today they don't have respect, and they don't understand.

txGroup.tx: Nlaken mees kin to, tefsofus rupreg tenen isa, me runa iwi.

idGroup.fg: Because today, young people do wrong and they say it is good.

txGroup.tx: Go naftekin runrogo, go tep̃ur knen, ka fo tli tefla, gar ruleperkat top.

idGroup.fg: And what they hear, and the biggest of these, I'll say it like this, they copy too much.

txGroup.tx: Nafte kin ruleka ki namter. Me runa isa, me rupregi, me runa iwi, me tene isa.

idGroup.fg: What they see with their eyes. They say it's bad, but they do it, and they say it's good, but it is bad.

txGroup.tx: Go tep̃ur knen ito naal nasum̃, iwel tem me rait, rutafnau teesa gar ki nafte kin iwi go nafte kin isa.

idGroup.fg: And the biggest of them is in the home, the mother and father teach their children what is good and what is bad.

txGroup.tx: Teesa rupak ektem rufo tae nafte kin iwi ga nafte kin isa.

idGroup.fg: Children go outside and will know what is good and what is bad.

txGroup.tx: Nlaken mees kin to, natkon ne, p̃afo tili na itarup̃ naor p̃ur.

idGroup.fg: Because today, in this village, you could say it has fallen down in a big way.

txGroup.tx: Itil mori itarup̃ naor p̃ur kat tefsofus, nafte kin rupreg ito natkon, tiawi rupregi, tefsofus rumai, rukkraksaki. Rukraksaki runa, "A tene isa".

idGroup.fg: It's the truth, hey spoil it and they say "Oh that is bad."

txGroup.tx: Rukraksaki me reki kin nen gar rukmer tfagi mer tfagi gar rukfo kano. <good inton ex>
Gawan ki kaipe tli, ruto leperkat top.Go nafte kin ruleka na, ruleka na isa rupregi. Me runa iwi.

idGroup.fg: The spoil it, but as for building themselves up, they can't. As I said, that's because they copy too much. And what they see, they see that they do bad. But they say it is good.

txGroup.tx: Go kamer pas skari tefla, taosi kin apo mer leka pak nafet tenen rumer nrus, motu ki komam, mal gar iwi.

idGroup.fg: And I'll add, when I look at those who are our elders, their time was good.

txGroup.tx: Pak mal ni nafet apap go iak, apu go ati, gar itawi. Go gar rutae kin nafte kin nanrogwen

idGroup.fg: To the time of our fathers and mothers, grandfathers and grandmothers, their time was good. And they know about understanding,

txGroup.tx: rutae kin naftekin nfaketanwen. Mal gar mal gar even kin ifwel kin telekor ni natkon/.

idGroup.fg: they know about respect. Their time, even if they were the leaders of the village.

txGroup.tx: Rufla nrikir ki na rupreg tenen, nawesien ni natkon. Kuleka rumai pakruk naor iskei. Rupregi nrak iskei inom.

idGroup.fg: They would say to everyone that they are doing this, work for the village. You look, they come together at one place. They do it once and it is finished.

txGroup.tx: Ko rufla, rufla, mees ifla ta nom, ifla ta nom mau, matol rumai, [pkaskei pa pnut] nawesien gar.

idGroup.fg: And if it is not finished today, if it is not all done, tomorrow they'll come to their work.

txGroup.tx: Mees kin to, tefsofus ni mees, okey ifwel kin, telekor ni natkon, rukmai, rufla sos nsaisei nawesien.

idGroup.fg: Today, young people today, if the leaders of the village come, if they call for some work,

txGroup.tx: Ale rupa, paakor mees, rufla mai paakor p̃ulp̃og, rufla wes pan nawesien pan ipi kotfak aliat.

idGroup.fg: They come out today, maybe they come out in the morning, they might work until midday.

txGroup.tx: Rufla pan fam, rufam su rumai. Ko rufla pan fam su rumer mai.

idGroup.fg: They would go to eat, they finish eating, they come. Or they finish eating and they come back.

txGroup.tx: Me tefsofus, rupan rufam su, nawesien ipi kotfak to, rutaf kai pe pa.

idGroup.fg: But the young people, they go, they finish eating, the work is half done, they leave then they're gone.

txGroup.tx: Nafet kotfak nawesien gar nen ito, nafet tiawi kin rufo mai paskar nawesien gar pan pan pnuti.

idGroup.fg: There's lots of their half work around, all the old people join their work to finish it.

txGroup.tx: Sefmal kin rupa pnuti mees, [ipi mees] me if pi matol, matol rumer mai skari, pa pnuti matol.

idGroup.fg: Whatever time they come to finish it, if it is tomorrow, they will join their work, they will finish it tomorrow.

txGroup.tx: Go neu nafsan neu inom sa.

idGroup.fg: As for me, my story is finished here.
